jmines.model.events
Interface GameBoardListener

All Superinterfaces:
EventListener
All Known Implementing Classes:
GamePanel, MainFrame
public interface GameBoardListener
extends EventListener

Interface to implement to intercept GameBoardEvents.

Author:
Zleurtor
